Comment: I don’t read much into this.  They are just going to suspend her and see how the charges play out.  They can’t leave her on the bench while she’s facing federal charges because it would hurt the public’s perception of the court.  They also probably won’t fire her before the case is resolved because of the old innocent until proven guilty standard.
